meta.title: Univent — Clean Air for Everyone
meta.description: Univent — №1 in ventilation in Uzbekistan. 1500+ products, 15+ sales points. Clean air for everyone.

hero.title: Clean Air for Everyone
hero.description: Univent — professional team and market leader in ventilation in Uzbekistan. 1500+ items and 15+ sales points across the country.

about.title: About Company
about.description: Univent company was the first to bring ventilation to the systemic level in the Republic of Uzbekistan. Thanks to our many years of experience and professional approach, we were able to transform ventilation from a set of separate solutions into a full-fledged engineering system, accessible to different spheres — from residential to industrial objects
about.mission: Our team's professionalism, deep knowledge and continuous development enable us to offer clients modern and reliable solutions. Certified supplies from leading world manufacturers guarantee quality and compliance with international standards. The largest warehouse coverage in the country provides uninterrupted deliveries and fast order fulfillment.

axial.title: Axial Fans
axial.description: Productive solutions for industry and commerce.

duct.title: Duct Fans
duct.description: Compact solutions for building ventilation systems.

supply.title: Supply / Recuperators
supply.description: Energy efficient supply and heat recovery.

benefits.title: Why Univent
benefits.description: Professionalism, scale and stability of supplies - what sets us apart in the market.

items.first_desc: We systematically develop the ventilation market in Uzbekistan.
